## Accent

Components which can or should be emphasized against others in close proximity.

| Preview                                                           | Name                                                           | Default Value                                |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-accent-background" />           | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-accent-background" />           | `var(--salt-palette-accent)`                 |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-accent-background-disabled" />  | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-accent-background-disabled" />  | `var(--salt-palette-accent-disabled)`        |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-accent-borderColor" />          | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-accent-borderColor" />          | `var(--salt-palette-accent)`                 |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-accent-borderColor-disabled" /> | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-accent-borderColor-disabled" /> | `var(--salt-palette-accent-disabled)`        |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-accent-foreground" />           | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-accent-foreground" />           | `var(--salt-palette-foreground-primary-alt)` |

## Focused

Components which can be focused using the mouse or keyboard.The following variables can be used on their own, but make up parts of the more commonly used borders and outlines below.

| Preview                                                     | Name                                                     | Default Value                                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-focused-outlineColor" />  | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-focused-outlineColor" />  | `var(--salt-palette-accent-stronger)`                                                                |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-focused-outlineStyle" />  | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-focused-outlineStyle" />  | `dotted`                                                                                             |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-focused-outlineWidth" />  | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-focused-outlineWidth" />  | `2px`                                                                                                |

| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-focused-outline" />       | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-focused-outline" />       | `var(--salt-focused-outlineWidth) var(--salt-focused-outlineStyle) var(--salt-focused-outlineColor)` |

## Separable

Group of attributes to separate information/elements. Connected to Container. Level 1 - used when subtle division is needed/to divide similar items e.g. options within a list, individual comments. Level 2 - used to divide related areas e.g. heading and body text. Level 3 - used to separate areas of content that are not closely related e.g. app header from main content

| Preview                                                               | Name                                                               | Default Value                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------- |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-borderStyle" />           | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-borderStyle" />           | `solid`                                        |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-primary-borderColor" />   | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-primary-borderColor" />   | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-contrast-mediumLow)` |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-secondary-borderColor" /> | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-secondary-borderColor" /> | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-contrast-low)`       |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-tertiary-borderColor" />  | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-tertiary-borderColor" />  | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-contrast-lower)`     |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-foreground" />            | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-foreground" />            | `var(--salt-palette-foreground-primary)`       |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-foreground-hover" />      | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-foreground-hover" />      | `var(--salt-palette-foreground-primary)`       |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-foreground-active" />     | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-foreground-active" />     | `var(--salt-palette-foreground-primary-alt)`   |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-background" />            | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-background" />            | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-none)`               |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-background-hover" />      | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-background-hover" />      | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-weak)`               |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-separable-background-active" />     | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-separable-background-active" />     | `var(--salt-palette-accent)`                   |

## Track

Components which have the ability to visually indicate progress, scale, or range along a defined track.

| Preview                                                            | Name                                                            | Default Value                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-track-borderStyle" />            | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-track-borderStyle" />            | `solid`                                     |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-track-borderStyle-active" />     | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-track-borderStyle-active" />     | `solid`                                     |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-track-borderStyle-complete" />   | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-track-borderStyle-complete" />   | `solid`                                     |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-track-borderStyle-incomplete" /> | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-track-borderStyle-incomplete" /> | `dotted`                                    |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-track-borderColor" />            | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-track-borderColor" />            | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-contrast-medium)` |
| <NextThemedBlockView name="--salt-track-borderColor-disabled" />   | <CopyToClipboard value="--salt-track-borderColor-disabled" />   | `var(--salt-palette-alpha-contrast-lowest)` |
